#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int m,n,i,p,j;
    scanf("%d",&m);
     scanf("%d",&n);
      scanf("%d",&p);
      long long MOD=1000000007;
     long long int grid[m+1][n+1];
      int x,y;
      for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
            grid[i][j]=0;
    }
      for(i=0;i<p;i++)
      {scanf("%d",&x);
     scanf("%d",&y);
     grid[x][y]=-1; }
     if(grid[1][1]==-1)
     {printf("0");
     return 0;}

    for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        if(grid[i][1]==0)
        grid[i][1]=1LL;
        else
            break;

    }
    for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(grid[1][i]==0)
        grid[1][i]=1LL;
        else
            break;

    }
    for(i=2;i<=m;i++)
    {
        for(j=2;j<=n;j++)
        {
            if(grid[i][j]==-1)
                continue;
            else
            {
                if(grid[i][j-1]>0)
                    grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i][j-1]+MOD)%MOD;
                if(grid[i-1][j]>0)
                    grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i-1][j]+MOD)%MOD;
            }
        }
    }
   printf("%lld",(grid[m][n] >= 0 ? grid[m][n] : 0));
return 0;
}
